items.sentence: I'm glad that the guys who broke into your house got caught.
Tom still doesn't have the courage to tell Mary what he did.
I knew then and there that I could never get along with Tom.
Tom got a job commensurate with his training and experience.
Tom and Mary have their ups and downs in their relationship.
Tom gets very argumentative with a few beers under his belt.
Tom drank himself into a stupor when Mary walked out on him.
Tom was on edge waiting for news of how Mary's surgery went.
Tom only had a faint inkling of what Mary was talking about.
Tom thought the used car salesman was trying to rip him off.
